item.title: Easy Pickpocketing

item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

MidGuardian:

im lost lol. can i copy paste the text into the post?

sorry for confusing you but basically you can have something illegal as long as it’s hosted somewhere else so that mopar can’t be held liable for anything bad.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

basically you xcan link to anything illegal, just dont host it on mopars sight, otherwise he will get in trouble. by hosing i mean attaching. do not attach anything illegal here, linking however is fine

Read full topic

item.title: Easy Pickpocketing
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Ok you know what attachments are right? If not, an attachment is some type of file that is “attached” to your post. Attached meaning, joined.

So if you have a download that is illegal that is ATTACHED to your post as a file, then that is not allowed. If you have uploaded the file to megaupload.com, rapidshare.de, or wherever, then it’s perfectly legal to link to that download. Just do not include the download as an attachment to your post, so a simple link is fine.

Do you understand now?

Read full topic

item.title: Easy Pickpocketing
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

lol It’s not attached. He’s not disobeying the rules.

Attached meaning attached to the forum topic/post. Don’t attach anything illegal to your posts. But it’s perfectly legal to link to illegal links. It’s just not legal to go there or download it.

Read full topic

item.title: Easy Pickpocketing
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

TUTORIAL RULES:

* No talking of Rep.
* A good title to define what you're talking about.
* Pictures. To take a screenie of something on your computer, press the Print Screen (Prt Scrn) button and then open up paint and click on Edit > Paste.
* Descriptional. Please make your tutorials so descriptional that we will not have to go to a 3rd party website.
* [b]DO NOT CONTAIN ILLEGAL MATERIAL.[/b] If you have to have illegal material on your tutorial, please link to it from another website. Do not attach it to your post.
* Do not contain TUT or [TUT] or whatever. This is the tutorial section, it's implied.
* Do not contain coming soons for the entire tutorial. It's agravating. When you're done with the tutorial post it, but please no coming soons.
* No stupid tutorials.
* Always list your sources.

Read full topic
